Controller

Class MenuController

  • java.lang.Object

      • java.awt.MenuBar
        • Controller.MenuController

    public class MenuController
extends java.awt.MenuBar

    De controller voor het menu

    • Method Detail

      • createMenuItem

        private java.awt.MenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String name,
                               AbstractCommand command)
        Create a menu item and add the command as action listener.
        Parameters:
        name - The visible name of the menu item. The first character of the name is used as short cut.
        command - The command to be executed when the menu item is clicked.

      • createMenuItem

        private java.awt.MenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String name,
                               AbstractCommand command,
                               char menuShortCut)
        Create a menu item and add the command as action listener
        Parameters:
        name - The visible name of the menu item
        command - The command to be executed when the menu item is clicked.
        menuShortCut - The character used as menu short cut
